verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

On the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* shalt thou set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w therein|strong="H8033"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H5526"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* with the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*.

And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* in the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, and set in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* the things that are to be set in \w order|strong="H6187"\w* upon it; and thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* in the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, and \w light|strong="H5927"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 40.4 \ft the things…: Heb. the order thereof\f*

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for the \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* to the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* between the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* therein.

And thou shalt set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and hang \w up|strong="H5414"\w* the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* at the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and all that \add is\add* therein, and shalt \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* it, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof: and it shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

And thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: and it shall be an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 40.10 \ft most holy: Heb. holiness of holinesses\f*
And thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* it.

And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* them with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H3847"\w* upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* him, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* him; that he may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.
And thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* them with \w coats|strong="H3801"\w*:

And thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* them, as thou didst \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, that they may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*: for their \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* shall surely be an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w* throughout their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.
Thus \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* was reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* his \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* thereof, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof, and reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* his \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*.

And he spread \w abroad|strong="H6566"\w* the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* over the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon it; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* into the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* on the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*:

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* of the \w covering|strong="H4539"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* in the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, upon the \w side|strong="H3409"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*.

And he \w set|strong="H6187"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* upon it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* in the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, on the \w side|strong="H3409"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*.

And he \w lighted|strong="H5927"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*:

And he \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* thereon; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
¶ And he set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \add by\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* upon it the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w set|strong="H7760"\w* the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* between the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* there, to \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \add withal\add*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* and their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* thereat:

When they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and when they came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, they \w washed|strong="H7364"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And he reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H5414"\w* the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. So \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

¶ Then a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, because the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w abode|strong="H7931"\w* thereon, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And when the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* over the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w onward|strong="H5265"\w* in all their \w journeys|strong="H4550"\w*:\f + \fr 40.36 \ft went onward: Heb. journeyed\f*
But if the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* were not taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, then they \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* not till the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that it was taken \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

For the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* upon the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, and \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* was on it by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, throughout all their \w journeys|strong="H4550"\w*.
